attributes.description: For this speedy salad, you'll toss creamy mozzarella, cherry tomatoes and freshly baked ciabatta croutons in a quick balsamic vinaigrette. Top with seared pesto chicken, and it's done!
attributes.name: Pesto Chicken Caprese Salad With Croutons

attributes.description: In this quick, simple dish, you'll smother tender pulled chicken thighs with sweet, fiery hoisin sauce, and serve on wholewheat sesame noodles with garlicky greens. Garnish with chilli and spring onion to serve.
attributes.name: Pulled Hoisin Chicken And Sesame Noodles

attributes.description: "Have a taste of this! This bowl's full a' juicy jumbo prawns, brown rice, pickled radishes, creamy avo and carrot ribbons – and it tastes as good as it looks! Finish off with a drizzle of zingy ginger and lime dressing."
attributes.name: Sweet Chilli Jumbo Prawn Cali-Style Sushi Bowl

claims.disclaimer: Carb refuel recipes are substantial meals, full of carbs and protein, perfect post-workout to refuel your muscles.

attributes.description: Slow-cooked lamb ragù with tomato and mint, layered with potatoes, roasted aubergines and creamy béchamel sauce.
attributes.name: Charlie Bigham's Moussaka

attributes.label: Mozzarella (v) (125g)
attributes.name: 125g mozzarella ball
attributes.sub_ingredients: pasteurised cows milk, salt, microbial rennet, citric acid

attributes.label: 4 pcs chicken thigh (w/o skin, w/o bone, 320g)
attributes.name: 320g British skinless chicken thighs

attributes.label: Hoisin sauce 40g (packed)
attributes.name: 40g hoisin sauce
attributes.sub_ingredients: water, sugar, white miso paste (soya), cornflour, garlic puree, caramelised sugar syrup, 5 spice, rice vinegar, chilli puree, yeast extract , salt, citric acid

attributes.label: Black sesame seeds (5g)
attributes.name: 5g black sesame seed
attributes.sub_ingredients: Whole hulled black sesame seeds (100%). Produced in a factory that handles nuts, soya, mustard, celery and fish.

attributes.label: Wheat noodles (2 nests) (Podpak)
attributes.name: 2 wholewheat noodle nests
attributes.sub_ingredients: wholemeal flour (contains gluten) (47%), wheat flour contains gluten (wheat flour, calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), salt, firming agent: (potassium carbonate, sodium carbonate), may contain egg.

attributes.label: Balsamic vinegar sachet (15ml)
attributes.name: 15ml balsamic vinegar
attributes.sub_ingredients: wine vinegar, concentrated grape must, potassium metabisulphite (sulphites)

attributes.label: Toasted sesame oil (15ml, packed)
attributes.name: 15ml toasted sesame oil
attributes.sub_ingredients: sesame seed (100%). Produced in a factory that handles nuts, peanuts, soya, mustard, celery and fish.

attributes.label: Charlie Bighams Moussaka for 2 (655g)
attributes.name: Charlie Bigham's Moussaka for 2
attributes.sub_ingredients: lamb (20%), milk, potatoes, aubergine (8%), tomatoes, cream (milk), water, onions, passata, rapeseed oil, butter (milk), fortified wheat flour (wheat flour, calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), white wine, Cheddar cheese (milk), tomato purée, pasteurised free- range egg yolk, garlic purée, parsley, lamb stock (lamb extract, water, yeast extract, sugar, cornflour, onion concentrate, salt, rosemary oil, thyme oil), cornflour, breadcrumbs (fortified wheat flour (wheat flour, calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), salt, yeast, colours (colour caramel and colour paprika extract), sugar, sunflower oil, turmeric extract), Regato cheese (milk), salt, oregano, thyme, ground coriander, black pepper, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, ground cayenne pepper, ground pimento, ground bay leaf, dried mint. May contain peanut, nuts & sesame

attributes.name: 8ml soy sauce
attributes.sub_ingredients: water, soya bean, wheat (gluten), salt, alcohol (ethanol)

attributes.label: Chilli jam pot (25g)
attributes.name: 25g pot of chilli jam
attributes.sub_ingredients: sugar, chillies, peppers, vinegar, onions, garlic, lemon juice, salt

attributes.label: Soy Sauce (15ml)
attributes.name: 15ml soy sauce
attributes.sub_ingredients: water, soya bean, wheat (gluten), salt, alcohol (ethanol)

attributes.label: Jumbo king prawns (248g)
attributes.name: 248g jumbo king prawns
attributes.sub_ingredients: king prawns (crustacean) 93%, added water, salt. May contain molluscs

attributes.label: Ciabatta roll (80g)
attributes.name: 1 ciabatta roll
attributes.sub_ingredients: Wheat flour [wheat flour, calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin], water, yeast, olive oil, salt, sugar

attributes.label: Classic nut pesto pot (45g)
attributes.name: 45g classic basil nut pesto
attributes.sub_ingredients: sunflower seed oil, Italian basil (36%), cashew nut, Grana Padano PDO cheese (milk, egg), glucose, Pecorino Romano PDO cheese (milk), sea salt, crushed pine kernels, extra virgin olive oil, whey protein (milk), flavourings, potato flakes, spices, acidity regulator: lactic acid; antioxidant: rosemary extract. May contain peanut & nuts
